snippet.title: Micron Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Micron is a puzzle / rhythm game from Apparition Games.  Challenge yourself to solve 51 reflection based puzzles (plus 12 bonus puzzles) in which you create music just by playing the game.

Micron is available on iOS, Android, PC, Mac, and Linux.

App Store: http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/micron/id532916819
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.apparitiongames.micron
Desura: http://www.desura.com/games/micron
Indievania: http://www.indievania.com/games/micron

Official site: http://microngame.com
